statements: DELETE FROM customer_feedback_data WHERE customer_id = 100 AND feedback_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM customer_feedback_data WHERE customer_id = 100 AND feedback_date > '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM customer_feedback_data WHERE sentiment_score < 0.5 OR feedback_text ILIKE '%poor%' ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
DELETE FROM customer_service WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 5 AND customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM SentimentAnalysis WHERE sentiment_id = 10 AND sentiment_score > 0.5;
